explains: adj. 主教的；主教管辖的；主教制度的
n. （巴、美、尼）埃庇史克琶乐（人名）
wordGroup: episcopal church 苏格兰圣公会；美国新教圣公会

sentences.en: The Episcopal church has seen the most turmoil.
sentences.cn: 圣公会教堂经历的最动荡。

sentences.en: She was in high favor at the episcopal palace of Arras.
sentences.cn: 她在阿拉斯主教教区里很受人尊敬。

sentences.en: Some 60 parishes of the Episcopal Church in the United States made similar moves last year.
sentences.cn: 去年美国约有60个教区的教会也有类似的举动。
